Entries.winter_Mon10: Winter really is the perfect time to explore the mines.$u#$b#I guess I'll see you down there!$h

Entries.summer_Tue4: Until the end of Fall, the ocean radiates higher levels of arcane energies.$u#$b#If you can fish for one, I would find Super Cucumber very useful for my studies.$u

Entries.summer_28: I'll miss the beach, now that fall is right around the corner.$s#$b#At least I've got my skateboard. See you around, @.$u

Entries.summer_27: Tomorrow night the sea will be full of glowing jellyfish.$u#$b#In an old fisherman's tale, these are named the 'Moonlight Jellies'.$u

Entries.fall_Wed4: Have you heard of Skull Cavern? It's a cave rumored to be near Calico desert.$u#$b#I read about it, there's just so much to learn from books.$h
